messages.title: It doesn't have to be like this.
messages.content: I don't accept that Britain is doomed to the most extreme version of Brexit backed by Theresa May. I won't let the Conservatives take our NHS towards more cuts and privatisation. Not without a fight.

messages.title: There's so much at stake in this election and it's in your hands.
messages.content: I'm talking about your job. I'm talking about the future of our NHS and schools here in Manchester, Withington. I'm talking about our right to live, work and travel across Europe.

messages.title: It's your choice, it's your future – help change it by voting Liberal Democrat on 8th June.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Fight to stop Theresa May's extreme Brexit wrecking our country's future.
Protect NHS and schools from more cuts and privatisation.

issues.brexitEurope: Fight to stop Theresa May's extreme Brexit wrecking our country's future.
issues.health: Protect NHS from more cuts and privatisation.

leaflet.personalStatement: This election is about voting for what you believe in.

images.caption: Tim Farron - Leader of the Liberal Democrats

leaflet.additionalNotes: PS – Join the millions like you and use your postal vote to stop Theresa May's extreme Brexit wrecking our country's future. Vote for the Liberal Democrats.
